cab.content: I3 d 9(P 239U) . From Viceroy, 13th March 1920.(Received 25th, 10 a.m.)296 S. Afghanistan. As question of export of arms to Afghanistan may be mentioned in forthcoming discussions by Afghan representatives, we should be glad of early expression of your views on our telegram of 23rd November last, No. 1586 S., as to whether there would be any possibility of such export under special, licence should treaty of friendship be ultimately negotiated at some future date.
